  • Constructor Details

    • Human

      public Human(Village parentVillage, Position position)
      Construct a new human
      Parameters:
      parentVillage - Village where the human lives
      position - Starting position

  • Method Details

    • tryEquipArmor

      private void tryEquipArmor()
      Try to equip armor. Succeeds when there is at least one armor item present in the parent village inventory.

    • tryEquipSword

      public void tryEquipSword()
      Try to equip sword. Succeeds when there is at least one sword item present in the parent village inventory.

    • getTeamID

      public int getTeamID()
      Get the human Team ID
      Overrides:
      getTeamID in class Creature
      Returns:
      Team ID

    • tryMoveTowards

      private void tryMoveTowards(Position position)
      Try to make a move towards the given position
      Parameters:
      position - Position to move towards

    • makeMoveTowards

      private void makeMoveTowards(Position position)
      Make a move towards the given position. If it fails for 10 times in a row, move randomly for the next 100 ticks.
      Parameters:
      position - Position to move towards

    • getArmor

      public int getArmor()
      Get usages of armor left

    • attackCreature

      private void attackCreature(Creature creature)
      Attack the given creature
      Parameters:
      creature - Creature to attack

    • observeAndFollow

      private void observeAndFollow()
      Get the nearest enemy creature within vision distance. If there is any, make a move towards it. Make a random move otherwise.

    • tryEatFood

      private void tryEatFood()
      Try to eat food. Succeeds when the human's health is below maximum and there is at least one food item available in the parent village inventory.

    • inVillageActions

      private void inVillageActions()
      Perform actions when in village. Store all inventory in the parent village and try to equip armor and sword (if not already equipped). Try to eat food.

    • tryCollectResource

      private void tryCollectResource()
      Try to collect resources from the map and add them to own inventory

    • move

      public void move()
      Make a complete human move. Try to hunt something (or somebody), follow enemies and perform in-village actions. If the inventory is full, return to the parent village.
      Overrides:
      move in class Creature

    • resurrect

      public Creature resurrect()
      Does nothing as human cannot be resurrected
      Specified by:
      resurrect in class Creature
      Returns:
      null

      Description copied from class: Creature
      Attack the creature and kill if necessary
      Overrides:
      attack in class Creature
      Parameters:
